group_1.narration: At last, Ruri and Tsukihiko were confronted@with the first major trial of their love.

group_1.textLeft: They said that Big Brother and Ruri...@might have the whole thing rescinded...
It means calling the marriage off.
It sounds like Ruri's great-uncle is violently opposed@to it...

group_1.narration: Ruri's family had fallen into disgrace when its head @passed away several generations prior.@He had been the senior vassal of their domain,@and was thus assassinated during the@chaotic final years of the Tokugawa shogunate.

It was said that merchants from the East side@had secretly been responsible,@as they'd had their eye on the trade interests that would@result from the end of the shogunate@and the opening of Japan's ports.

group_1.textLeft: You mean...

group_1.textRight: Yes. My household is said to have been the primary@instigator, I'm afraid.

group_1.textLeft: But that was decades ago— neither of us had even@been born yet...!

group_1.textRight: Alas, some who remember the events personally are@still alive and well.

group_1.textLeft: But to call off the marriage because of it...?!
It's...@[chara:303902:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:303902:lipSynch_1]as if...
I'm going to speak to my uncle about this!
And if he still says "no"...
Would you be willing to elope with me?

group_1.narration: As Ruri's father had only married into the family,@her great-uncle held more sway than him within it.
But as Ruri made serious preparations@to elope after her initial failure to convince him,@her great-uncle was swayed by her determination...
...and had no choice but to reluctantly@approve of the marriage...

group_1.textLeft: Nice!@Things are really starting to look up!

group_1.textRight: And now everyone else will start to feel okay with@the marriage too, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. All the relatives of both families gradually@transitioned to a celebratory mood, as well.
Perhaps Tsukihiko and Ruri would overcome the@fetters of the past...
...and usher in a new era...@That's what they were all dreaming of.

group_1.textRight: Amane, Chiaki, you both gave an amazing@performance.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you!
Huh...? I thought you didn't have any scenes to@film today?

group_1.textRight: I'm on my way to Walnut's, but I just thought I'd@drop by to observe.
Are you all done for today?@You can come with me, if you'd like.

group_1.textLeft: ...Can we?

group_1.textRight: If you accompany me, we can get Kurumi to give us@a discou—
[chara:301001:effect_shake][chara:301001:motion_1][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]*Cough* I mean, serve us some of their limited-time@ice cream.

group_1.textLeft: Really?!
Thanks!@That's so nice of you, Ri-...
...[wait:0.8][chara:101901:lipSynch_1]Mi...a...??

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You had it right the first time!@Why'd you correct yourself?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh! Okay. Sorry.
...Looks like they're not particularly hung up over@that little incident from last time.
